articles.author: Xan Brooks
articles.title: Michael Caine's novel will most likely be rubbish, but I'm glad he's found his happy ending - The Guardian
articles.description: Most actors make terrible novelists – but writing the ‘cracking thriller’ Deadly Game was life-affirming for the veteran star, so never mind the finished product
articles.content: God spare us another millionaire actor who fancies themself as a bestselling author unless the actor is Michael Caine, in which case good on him, raise your glass. The 90-year mainstay of British cin… [+4699 chars]

articles.title: Francoise Gilot: Artist, writer and Picasso's former lover, dies at 101 - BBC
articles.description: Gilot, who was 101, emerged from Picasso's shadow to become acclaimed as an artist in her own right.
articles.content:
Francoise Gilot, who emerged from the shadow of her lover Pablo Picasso to become acclaimed as an artist in her own right, has died at the age of 101.
An accomplished painter, Gilot also wrote a bes… [+3232 chars]
